constituent: undress, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, devil, horns, elder brother, teenager, mouth, human legs
heisigStory: To undress is to expose the flesh and tempt the devil in the eyes of one's onlookers. Ignore the moral if you want, but not the devil.
koohiiStory1: HORNY TEENAGERS love to UNDRESS FLESH.
koohiiStory2: Before you undress I should warn you -- the sight of flesh brings out the devil in me.
myStory: cởi đồ. từ bỏ. thoát. anh trai có râu cởi đồ lộ hàng
readingExamples: 脱ぐ (ぬ.ぐ), 脱げる (ぬ.げる)
words:
脱出(だっしゅつ): escape
脱する(だっする): to escape from, to get out
脱退(だったい): secession
脱線(だっせん): derailment, digression
脱ぐ(ぬぐ): take off clothes
